title: I, Who Got Transported to Another World with the Strongest Cheat, Quit the Knight and Went on a Journey but the Strongest Yandere Knight Captain in That World Followed Me so I Can’t See Another Girl - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Transported to Another World   Yandere
author: リヒト
description:
The three most basic human’s desire are hunger, sleeping and sexual desire. I was transferred into another world and for that reason, it was only a matter of course that I lost those three things. Everything I ate tasted so bad to the point I felt nauseous. When I went to sleep, I had a nightmare and jolted me awake. As for my son, my son didn’t react to anything, not even a twitch.

In order to break free from this predicament, I quit my current job as a knight and went on a journey.

Why did I come to this world? Why did I become like this? I went on a journey in order to find the answer to these questions….

……… And yet, why did the yandere knight captain come following me?!>
